text: Southwestern Oregon Community College is a public community college in Coos Bay, Oregon. It is Oregon's 2nd oldest community college, founded in 1961. ==History== Founded in 1961, the college originally served Coos County and western Douglas County. In 1995, Curry County joined the district. == See also == * List of Oregon community colleges ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Community colleges in Oregon Category:Education in Curry County, Oregon Category:Educational institutions established in 1959 Category:Coos Bay, Oregon Category:Universities and colleges accredited by the Northwest Commission on Colleges and Universities Category:Education in Coos County, Oregon Category:Education in Douglas County, Oregon Category:Buildings and structures in Coos County, Oregon Category:1961 establishments in Oregon
title: Southwestern Oregon Community College
